titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the restraining of the importation of iron vvyer into this kingdome, and for the support of that manufacture
Proclamations. 1630-05-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-hall, the seuenth day of May, in the sixt yeere of our reigne.
Arms 23 (with one leaf under the lion's leg); Steele notation: vvithin And 2) disaduantage 3) disposed Law,.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
